path: books/Category Theory For Programmers/14. Representable Functors/6

attr.a:
```haskell
data Pair a = Pair a a
instance Representable Pair where
    type Rep Pair = Bool
    tabulate f = Pair (f True) (f False)
    index (Pair x y) = \b -> if b then x else y
```
attr.q:
The functor:

`Pair a = Pair a a`

is representable. Can you guess the type that represents it? Implement `tabulate` and `index`.
